chapters.title: Chapter 23:  Foxheads
chapters.info: Lady Catalyn Haevin, p. 365—High Seat of House Haevin. She is a dark-eyed young woman, though barely more than a girl. She pledged the support of her House to Elayne. She is very presumptuous and snooty, especially for someone who had not even heard of Gareth Bryne (Elayne claims that miners in Baerlon had heard Lord Bryne's name). She is somewhat plump, and very proud; Elayne considers her to be ungovernable. Her sign is a blue bear. She was invited to the opera Elayne had performed in the Palace.
